name: Wenqing Chen
content: Wenqing Chen (陈文清) Menu Home Google Scholar DBLP Wenqing Chen (陈文清) Assistant Professor, School of Software Engineering, Sun Yat-sen University, Zhuhai, China E-mail: chenwq95@mail.sysu.edu.cn About me I am currently an assistant professor of the School of Software Engineering in the Sun Yat-sen University. Previously, I received a doctorate from the Institute of Artificial Intelligence of Shanghai Jiao Tong University in 2022. More recently, I receive a master's degree from Beijing Normal University in 2015 and a bachelor's degree from Huazhong University of Science and Technology in 2012, respectively. My research interests include Natural Language Processing (NLP), Causal Inference, and Code Intelligence. I am looking for self-motivated students. Please drop me an email if you are interested. Research My research interests include: Natural Language Processing Causal Inference Code Intelligence Recent publications (Note: # indicates the authors with equal contributions, and * indicates the corresponding authors.)
